display_name: Calculated - RDI in supine body position (>= 3% desaturation)
description: missing if sleep time in supine position is 0 or if position sensore was not working or if studies scored as sleep/wake
calculation: 60*(hrembp3 + hnrbp3 + carbp3 + canbp3 + oarbp3 + oanbp3 + marbp3 + manrbp3)/(remepbp+nremepbp)
